<h1>One Tick</h1>

<p>OneTick aims to enhance our understanding and management of tick-borne diseases in urban and peri-urban environments by integrating ecological, biomedical, and public health perspectives. We will address the interconnected health of humans, animals, and the environment by employing a One Health approach.</p>
:::
